Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class RobotTarget

Robot Target class, defines robot target data. The robt target data is used to define the position of the robot and external axes.

Inheritance
System.Object
Action
RobotTarget
Implements
ITarget

public RobotTarget(string name, Plane plane, Plane referencePlane, int axisConfig, double Eax_a, double Eax_b = 9000000000, double Eax_c = 9000000000, double Eax_d = 9000000000, double Eax_e = 9000000000, double Eax_f = 9000000000)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String name

Robot target name, must be unique.
Rhino.Geometry.Plane plane

Robot target plane.
Rhino.Geometry.Plane referencePlane

Reference plane. Target planes will be reoriented from this plane to the origin (WorldXY).
System.Int32 axisConfig

Robot axis configuration as a number (0-7).
System.Double Eax_a

The position of the external logical axis “a” expressed in degrees or mm.
System.Double Eax_b

The position of the external logical axis “b” expressed in degrees or mm.
System.Double Eax_c

The position of the external logical axis “c” expressed in degrees or mm.
